Gesper: I agree with you. We hold grudges to no one, and I think my 
group can benefit from trusting yours. Therefore, I suggest we hold at 
least a peace treaty, and that we send ambassadors to each other in 
order to learn how you fight and how you live. What do you think of 
this?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Pacifix looked Gesper over, "As long as you present no hostilities, 
you
> can trust the Autobots."
